name: Mobius Materials
headline: The spot market for semiconductors
description: Mobius is the safe spot market for electronic components like microcontrollers and capacitors. We help electronics manufacturers buy and sell chips quickly, safely & at market prices.

founders.name: Margaret Upshur, Founder
founders.description: Margaret is the CEO and founder of Mobius Materials, a marketplace where manufacturers can buy and sell chips quickly, safely & at market prices. Previously, she led operations at Particle, a SF based electronics company, building a 40 person multinational team that launched 170 different products and shipped millions of units. She also worked at McKinsey where she consulted on manufacturing applications and helped open an office in Kenya. Margaret has an engineering degree from Duke.

Sourcing is one of the riskiest parts of bringing a hardware product to market.
### Underbuy

From the Founder
## Mobius solves electronic component inventory issues
"As the head of operations for an IoT module manufacturer, every year I was throwing away hundreds of thousands of dollars of new excess components and then turning around and paying out the wazoo for other similar components. At [Mobius Materials](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/d2pmqd04.na1.hs-sales-engage.com/Ctc/RJ+23284/d2pMQD04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3kGVj0F5V8T09WTW3YhZts3VpFKwW9l8Wbb7SlXXQW7L81zm4kvh2VW3-DbJF2VJPCxN97bHvPt7XHMW26GHj08Hg-PnW2Ysc5N7w3x9JW30lvWD46LgGzW1Mr4B95RMXJPW9g_Zxh1ckzKtW12GWK243NhhfN2gzcMpsZxcjW1745gs3Gv-yVW2NdYvP5ZxJdTV-8bjF43M-wjW7MvQXB6Th2jsW8G2jgh33_W8-W8Lx1Sq2N3LWgW5Bt4jV92RC-HW6ktjVv7kNqS0W1YCFn_8ds3g0f1kXr9q04>), our mission is to fix this breakdown by helping manufacturers improve P&L and getting these parts back into the supply chain."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dc44bf8be85d317885a95_margaret_profile.jpeg)
Margaret Upshur
Founder and CEO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dc4129f1fdb61a8a2eab1_mobius_dark.png)
[Connect on LinkedIn](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/margaretupshur>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dbbf9a1ad3f469fdc6a50_Headshot%20cropped.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dcc77b625d80830cbf7b2_worker.jpg)
Built for Manufacturers
## Why buy from us?
We only take parts from vetted suppliers and we comprehensively test the authenticity of our parts.
###### Savings
Get 10 - 70% off common parts by buying at market rates. Discounts vary by component grade.
###### Availability
Shortage in the market? Get access to rare stock other hardware manufacturers stockpiled.
[Create an account](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/app.mobiusmaterials.com/>)
## Hundreds of OEMs, Millions of parts sold
With partners who say things like:
“Mobius was able to swap out 12 parts from our BOM and save us more than 25% of the cost. We're excited to spend our time and money on things that drive value for the business instead of sourcing”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dc3b09b64e8779fe29a99_hailey.jpeg)
Hailey N.
Chief Executive Officer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dc3e9d89f1ae527e4ca1c_locus_lock.png)
"With brokers we sold less than 2 parts per month, after partnering with Mobius we have been securing over 10 orders every month. The team at Mobius has made a tangible impact on reducing our excess inventory."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/65b0601ba6038fc98df87adf_kendell.png)
Kendell W.
Manufacturing & Operations Leader
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659dce11eab33d2191447850_white_microart.png)
## Mobius Blog and News
Connect with Mobius's newest tools, keep up with the latest on part shortages and manufacturing, and learn about building a circular economy for your business.
[See more](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/</all-blog>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/65a1a5503fe5bdb4249de3a1_blog_video_thumbnail.png)
### Woman-led, environmentally focused startup Mobius Materials finds success in Virginia
Mobius Materials stems from an “underground $15 billion problem,” the company’s founder Margaret Upshur said.
[Read now](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/richmond.com/news/local/business/mobius-materials/article_d69aaafc-0f92-11ee-8ccb-7bb7202c4697.html>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a19d63f06f93414c93dec5/65a19e18e5450e1a2752a439_62f45621d468ee90a3146c6d_anne-nygard-6BCgNl-UY6A-unsplash.avif)
### A $100B counterfeiting problem
Manufacturers are facing increasing dangers from the gigantic semiconductor gray market as the shortage continues
[Read now](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/mobiusblogr.medium.com/a-100b-counterfeiting-problem-1e071dce8d58>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a19d63f06f93414c93dec5/65a19e17f43b03dc725c0efd_631b407d7d04e613e22dc08d_Freight.avif)
### Reducing Waste: a checklist for electronics manufacturers
Your checklist: Carbon neutral materials, renewable energy, RoHS compliance, packaging and transport.
[Read now](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/mobiusblogr.medium.com/reducing-waste-a-checklist-for-electronics-manufacturers-17965f947cd2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a19d63f06f93414c93dec5/65a19e1850e7199dc7208948_62f43c89c7f4a560b2796803_the-blowup-t06aN6vewaQ-unsplash.avif)
### Why Sustainability Ultimately Begins and Ends with E-Waste, and not Paper Straws
Paper straws are stressful, but e-wasting properly shouldn't be.
[Read now](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com/<https:/mobiusblogr.medium.com/why-sustainability-ultimately-begins-and-ends-with-e-waste-and-not-paper-straws-c06612cbefeb>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6595f1b92b5c3b8bbc40b9cb/659db8d01245f92dcdd98ade_mobius_on_square-04.png)
## Keep your next project on track and under budget
Quickly source rare stock from other company's excess with the assurance that parts are tested and authentic.

generated_description:
### Mobius Materials Overview

**Company Name:** Mobius Materials  
**Founded:** 2020  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S20  
**Website:** [mobiusmaterials.com](https://www.mobiusmaterials.com)

#### Mission
Mobius Materials aims to create a safe and efficient spot market for semiconductors and electronic components, helping manufacturers buy and sell chips quickly and at market prices. The intent is to streamline the often cumbersome process of hardware sourcing and minimize the financial waste that comes from excess inventory.

#### Services Offered
Mobius acts as a B2B marketplace where electronics manufacturers can:
- Quickly buy and sell bulk electronic components
- Access a range of verified parts from reputable manufacturers, with significant savings up to 70%
- Source rare components, particularly useful during shortages

Their platform also addresses the common challenges manufacturers face: sourcing too few parts can lead to rushed re-orders, while over-sourcing can result in substantial financial loss. By connecting buyers with sellers of excess inventory, Mobius alleviates the risks associated with both underbuying and overbuying.

#### Industry Focus
Mobius is part of the broader hardware, manufacturing, and supply chain sectors, with a particular emphasis on semiconductors. The company has identified a critical need in the electronics industry— the overwhelming issue of waste and inefficiency in component sourcing.

#### Key Individuals
- **Founder & CEO:** Margaret Upshur, who has practical experience from her past as an operations head in an IoT module manufacturing context. She identified first-hand the problems of excess components, leading to the creation of Mobius.
- **Group Partner:** Gustaf Alstromer, a notable figure in the startup ecosystem.

#### Unique Selling Proposition
Mobius stands out by ensuring that all components are sourced from vetted suppliers, with every part authenticated and tested. This rigorous approach fosters trust and reliability, a critical need in an industry riddled with counterfeiting risks and supply chain uncertainties.

### Notable Testimonials
Mobius has received positive feedback, with partners highlighting its effectiveness in reducing costs and excess inventory. Some have noted substantial cost savings—around 25%—from swapping out ill-fitting components on their bills of materials (BOM).

### Conclusion
In a world where hardware sourcing is increasingly challenging, Mobius Materials is carving out a significant niche. By prioritizing efficiency and reliability, they hope not just to solve problems for manufacturers but also to elevate the way electronic components are traded globally. Their environmentally friendly approach and woman-led leadership reflect the evolving landscape of technology startups, making them a company to watch as they scale.
